name: Batatouille (noattendance)
description:
Batatouille : Vampire Cheffing Action

This is team 2's BA2b project based on the theme of 'Altruism'. Our brief was to make a score based game around the theme of Altruism and our outcome was Batatouille.

In Batatouille you go around the labyrinthian castlevania inspired castle to provide meals for your batty friends. The act of giving without expecting in return was what we interpreted Altruism to be, to do good for the sake of good. That is the Batrick way. With your cooking utensils at the ready set out to find ingredients and hungry friends a like. Good luck little chef and...
